reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Strengthening governance, health information, community health, supply chain and laboratory components for a resilient health system 2021-2023

description.narrative: Côte d'Ivoire - RSSH - Ministry of Health, Public Hygiene and Universal Health Coverage of the Republic of Côte d’Ivoire - MOH-UCP-FM. This program has the following goals: Contribuer à la santé et au bien-être de toutes les populations vivant en Côte d’Ivoire en particulier les personnes les plus vulnérables pour soutenir la croissance et le développement durable du pays / Contribute to the health and well-being of all populations living in Côte d'Ivoire, particularly the most vulnerable people, to support the country's growth and sustainable development.. Contribuer à la réduction de l'incidence et la mortalité associée aux trois maladies (VIH, TB et paludisme) / Contribute to the reduction of the incidence and mortality associated with the three diseases (HIV, TB and malaria). The objectives of this program are: Axe stratégique 1 : Renforcer la gouvernance et planification du secteur de la santé au niveau déconcentré et améliorer la qualité des services de santé pour le VIH, le paludisme, la tuberculose et la santé de la mère et de l’enfant / Strategic Area 1: To strengthen health sector governance and planning at decentralised level and improve the quality of health services for HIV, malaria, tuberculosis and maternal and child health. Axe stratégique 2 : Renforcer le cadre institutionnel et organisationnel de la santé communautaire et améliorer la couverture et la qualité des interventions communautaires / Strategic Area 2: To strengthen the institutional and organisational framework for community health and improving the coverage and quality of community interventions. Axe stratégique 3 : Renforcer le système de l’information sanitaire et améliorer la disponibilité et utilisation des données sanitaires de qualité pour la prise de décision à tous les niveaux / Strategic Area 3: To strengthen the health information system and improve the availability and use of quality health data for decision making at all levels. Axe strategique 4: Renforcer le système d’approvisionnement et de gestion des stocks au niveau déconcerté pour rendre disponible les médicaments et les produits clés au dernier kilomètre ainsi qu'au niveau communautaire / Strategic Area 4: To strengthen the supply and stock management system at the local level to make medicines and key products available at the last mile and at the community level.. Axe stratégique 5 : Renforcer la coordination, le partenariat et la gestion du système des laboratoires / Strategic Area 5: To strengthen the coordination, partnership and management of the laboratory system

title.narrative: Percentage of service delivery reports from community health workers integrated into HMIS
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Number of iCCM conditions treated among children under five in target areas during the reporting period
Percentage of districts that produce periodic analytical report(s) as per nationally agreed plan and reporting format during the reporting period
Percent of district health management teams or other administrative units that have developed a monitoring plan, including annual work objectives and performance measures
